fields.title: Event
fields.description: An event to run after M number of the herd have spawned

fields.title: Event Skip Count
fields.description: Number of the herd to skip before running the event

fields.title: Initial Event
fields.description: Event run for the first N of the herd are placed.

fields.title: Initial Event Count
fields.description: Number of times that the initial event will run

fields.title: Max Size
fields.description: Maximum number in this group to attempt to spawn

fields.title: Min Size
fields.description: Minimum number in this group to attempt to spawn
